# portkey_mcp_integration_workspace_access (Resource)

Manages workspace access for a Portkey MCP integration. Controls which workspaces can use a specific MCP integration.

## Example Usage

### Basic Usage

```terraform
resource "portkey_mcp_integration" "github" {
  name      = "GitHub MCP Server"
  url       = "https://mcp.github.com/sse"
  auth_type = "headers"
  transport = "sse"
}

resource "portkey_workspace" "dev" {
  name = "Development"
}

# Grant workspace access to the MCP integration
resource "portkey_mcp_integration_workspace_access" "github_dev" {
  mcp_integration_id = portkey_mcp_integration.github.id
  workspace_id       = portkey_workspace.dev.id
}
```

### Disable Access

```terraform
resource "portkey_mcp_integration_workspace_access" "github_dev" {
  mcp_integration_id = portkey_mcp_integration.github.id
  workspace_id       = portkey_workspace.dev.id
  enabled            = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mcp_integration_id` (String) The MCP integration ID or slug to grant workspace access to.
- `workspace_id` (String) The workspace ID to grant access to.

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the MCP integration is enabled for this workspace. Defaults to true.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier in format mcp_integration_id/workspace_id.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# Import using mcp_integration_id/workspace_id format
terraform import portkey_mcp_integration_workspace_access.example mcp-integration-id/workspace-id
```
